backend/main.mo: Actor implementing file, note, folder, mission, and authorization logic with types, state maps, and health/diagnostic queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing mission‑related UI and React Query tasks with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short descriptions summarizing the purpose and behavior of multiple frontend components and utilities.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation describing creation and verification of a Draft baseline identical to Live v114 with strict change‑control rules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, and service worker registration.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Post‑restoration freeze notice outlining prohibited changes and required user approval for modifications.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, and display configuration for MyGallery.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching, runtime caching, and offline fallback logic.
frontend/PWA_INSTALLABILITY_NOTES.md: Guide for verifying Chrome PWA installability, covering manifest, icons, service worker, and testing steps.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist documenting verification of all frontend files and behaviors to match Live version 114.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring theming, context providers, and intro-screen logic based on identity state.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing error states during actor initialization with retry, logout, and expandable technical details.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: SVG-based animated gallery icon with hover effects and decorative targeting rings.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty or placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed decorative bottom border line for layout styling.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog shown when a file cannot be opened in a new window, offering retry and download options.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog for previewing files of various types with actions for downloading, deleting, and moving files.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles uploading files, links, and notes with progress tracking, validation, and optional speech-to-text input.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that triggers folder-related actions with a folder icon and optional disabled state.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated dialog for listing, creating, renaming, and deleting folders with swipe actions and confirmation prompts.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: UI for listing, creating, renaming, deleting, and selecting folders with swipe actions and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Static footer displaying attribution and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full-screen viewer for browsing, downloading, deleting, sharing, and organizing files with swipe navigation.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays files and notes in a grid with selection, previews, bulk actions, and support dialogs.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle, sign-out menu, and progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Animated splash screen that fades out and triggers completion after a short delay.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link cannot be opened, offering retry and copy options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button to sign in using Internet Identity with loading indication.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full-screen mission view allowing task editing, autosave, and viewing attached files and notes.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title and task management, including adding, toggling, and removing tasks and submitting to backend.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that triggers the missions interface with animated icon and disabled state handling.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full‑screen mission browser supporting creation, deletion, swipe navigation, and switching between incomplete and completed missions.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wrapper component that constrains its children to a mobile‑only layout container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog allowing selected files or notes to be moved to an existing mission, handling loading and mutation states.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog for viewing a note with actions to download, share, move, or delete it.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files or notes into folders or back to the main collection, with performance diagnostics and mutation handling.
Swipeable row component enabling edit/delete actions with drag gestures and controlled open state.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Displays a unified upload progress bar showing overall percentage and item count.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Intro screen with a target-themed SVG graphic and onboarding text plus a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Context managing backend actor initialization, retry logic, error handling, and sign-out.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Context tracking multiple upload items with coalesced progress updates and legacy API compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor per identity and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Hook prefetching core home data once when the backend actor becomes ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Hook that detects whether the device uses a coarse (touch) pointer by listening to a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Implements debounced autosaving for mission title and tasks with change detection, concurrency handling, and mission switch resets.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, and updating missions via the backend actor, including cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and deleting notes with targeted cache invalidation and concurrency limiting.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for managing files and folders, including listing, folder contents, mission attachments, and creating folders with upload concurrency limits.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Custom React hook wrapping the browser SpeechRecognition API, handling interim/final transcripts, errors, and listening state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining light/dark theme variables, component styles, and mobile layout constraints.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point creating the React root, setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main homepage component handling authentication, data fetching, UI state, and optional dev smoke tests with lazy-loaded views.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Helpers for classifying backend actor initialization errors and standardizing related messages.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Utilities to open URLs externally, download files or notes, and share files via Web Share API.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Logic determining how files should open based on MIME category, supporting in-app viewer, office preview, or direct download.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes MIME types into previewable groups and returns human-readable labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Computes mission progress, checks completion status, and splits missions into complete/incomplete lists.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Provides BigInt‑safe equality checking for Task arrays.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Implements a toggleable performance diagnostics logger with timing utilities and async operation wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Logs React Query mutation lifecycle events during development.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs development‑only backend smoke tests for core flows like creating folders, missions, links, and notes, and formats results.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Provides a simple promise concurrency limiter with queueing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session‑stored parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and plugins.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical list of all frontend files that define the v114 baseline for drift detection.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing mission‑related fix requirements and existing feature definitions.
